title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 13 - Depositor Savings Information ("truth-in-savings")
content:

State Regulations
§ 13.1 - Definitions
§ 13.2 - Distribution of disclosure brochures
§ 13.3 - Form of disclosure
§ 13.4 - Disclosure of information on savings accounts
§ 13.5 - Disclosure of information on time deposits
§ 13.6 - Compliance with federal regulation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 13

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 14[1], 14-c

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
